ModMetaData.name: All The Hot Springs!
ModMetaData.author: Xeva / XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
A Retexture for Standalone Hot Spring. Main hotspring retextured with Hei's version.
Also adds in the following;
- Aoba's Reactor Hot Spring. - Bill Doors' Hot Spring. - Morrowind Hot Spring. - Oblivion Hot Spring. - Skyrim Hot Spring.
-
